subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Some new additions for the 12-470... I hope
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:

I have "reversing decks" and I do it on the computer with normal speech, a=
nd EVP. It's as real as anything else.
 
 Frank-s


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups=
.comFrom: orbhunterx@...: Mon, 3 Dec 2007 19:56:57 +0000Subject: =
[EVP-ITC] Re: Some new additions for the 12-470... I hope




Kewl!Who know=
s... I'm not totally convinced on Reverse Speech either. But then I suppose=
 trying as many different things as we are inspired to is a good thing.Lanc=
e--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:>>=
 > Yes, but only when the intuition hits to reverse a voice, or phrase. I d=
on't use it on everything, but there is often a reverse component. > > Fran=
k-S> > > To: EVP-ITC@...: orbhunterx@...: Mon, 3 Dec 2007 06:02:39 +0000Sub=
ject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Some new additions for the 12-470... I hope> > > > > Wh=
at about reverse speech?Has anyone considered trying to use this technique =
with voice recordings from the boxes? Lance--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, =
Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@> wrote:>> > Well, I can tell where that theor=
y came from! It's been my experience, they use what we use, as long as it's=
 something they can form voices out of. It's also been my experience that t=
he combo noise/frag voice is what our own minds create. I suggest you play =
with EVPmaker, with clear raw audio, you'll find no white noise needed. > >=
 I don't get any mention of technicians, or anykind of helper/operators on =
the other side. They sometimes talk about a network, but I couldn't tell yo=
u what that is, or if it's real. > > I think it's 99.99%PK. So not only do =
spirits, and other entities make voices, we can do it to, mostly unconciuos=
ly. > > Moon is still certain that it has to be random, despite the last se=
veral months of experiments that show the linear mode is far superior. > > =
If someone could take a digital speech recordng, stored in memory, and chop=
 it up, and play it back over a speaker, I think it would work just as well=
 as radio. You could get live voices, answers to questions, and never repla=
ce the raw audio. This is in fact EVPmaker, but it would be nice to have it=
 portable. EVPmaker pretty much took all the mystery out of this, and it's =
all but igonred. My system, and analog version of EVPmaker using technologi=
es I had worked wiht in the past. My mind did kind of assemble all the elem=
ents, so I got an image of the complete system. > > I thought I knew how th=
e voices in my boxes worked at one time..now I have no idea!> > Frank-S> > =
> > > To: EVP-ITC@: michaelcoletta@: Mon, 3 Dec 2007 00:22:35 +0000Subject:=
 [EVP-ITC] Some new additions for the 12-470... I hope> > > > > Excuse me i=
f I mispell some things in this post, I'm currently running the production =
board for a LIVE internet radion program going on right now, and I'm doing =
100 things at once!Okay... According to some, "...the Spirit Technicians an=
d Spirit Guides on the other side have repeatedly explained that the way th=
at the Telephone to the Dead technology works, is by spirit energy manipula=
ting the random voltage generator (RVG) and using white and pink noise, as =
well as radio fragment, to create real time voice answers to questions pose=
d from our side. The most important aspect to this device is the medium ope=
rator who works as an antenna or "interpreter" for living individuals askin=
g the questions."So, that said (or copied and pasted) I have decided that m=
y next attempt with the older version of the 12-470 will be the following:1=
) Add a method of variable voltage used to adjust the tuning circuit, simil=
ar to the RVG mentioned above. I went out and purchased another older 12-47=
0 today, to do just this.(Frank... I did some measurements of that VT and f=
ound a range to work with.. I hope!)2) Add that white or pink noise to be m=
ixed with the sweeping raw audio already available from the modified 12-470=
.3) Add an internal antenna for the 12-470.4) Add an interface so the user =
will be a active/passive part of the radio. As mentioned above, as the ante=
nna between the entities/spirits.So... if I can accomplish all that... mayb=
e the little ole' 12-470 will be recognized by the "experts", as having wha=
t the big mahcines now have... :-)Wish me luck in my adventure... and oh, b=
y-the-way... I hope to add all this, inside the existing case.- Mike > > > =
> > > > __________________________________________________________> You kee=
p typing, we keep giving. Download Messenger and join the i'm Initiative no=
w.> http://im.live.com/messenger/im/home/?source=3DTAGLM> > > > > > > > ___=
_______________________________________________________> You keep typing, w=
e keep giving. Download Messenger and join the i'm Initiative now.> http://=
im.live.com/messenger/im/home/?source=3DTAGLM>
